entities.name: snuffles
entities.description: Harry's nickname, mentioned by Sirius in the conversation.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: The hippogriff that Sirius is saying goodbye to.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's godfather, mentioned in the conversation as he says goodbye to Buckbeak and walks with Harry, Ron, and Hermione.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, mentioned in the conversation as he is walking back to Hogwarts with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's best friend, mentioned in the conversation as they walk back to Hogwarts.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's other best friend, mentioned in the conversation as they walk back to Hogwarts.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Ron's older brother, mentioned in the conversation as Ron wonders if Percy knows about Crouch.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: A person whose information is being discussed by Ron and Harry.

relationships.description: Sirius says goodbye to Buckbeak before transforming into a dog and leaving the cave.
Harry walks with Sirius as they leave the cave and head back to Hogwarts.
Ron walks with Hermione as they head back to Hogwarts.
Harry is mentioned in the conversation between Ron and Percy, where Ron wonders if Percy knows about Crouch.
